info.title: ConnectedCache
info.description: Microsoft Connected cache REST API version 2023-05-01-preview

get.description: Retrieves a list of available API operations
get.summary: Retrieves a list of available API operations under this Resource Provider

200.description: The request was successful; response contains the list of operations under Microsoft.ConnectedCache resource provider

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (Connected Cache does not exist.)

get.summary: Retrieves information about a customer Enterprise resource
get.description: Retrieves the properties of a Enterprise customer

200.description: The request was successful; response contains the cacheNodes

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (cacheNodes does not exist.)

put.description: Creates a cacheNodes with the specified create parameters

200.description: The request was successful; response contains the enterpriseCustomers

201.description: The request was successful; response contains the updated Connected Cache node

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (enterpriseCustomers could not be created/updated)

delete.description: Deletes an existing customer Enterprise resource

200.description: The request was successful; the Cache Node is deleted

204.description: The request was successful; Cache Node does not exist

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 409 - Conflict

patch.summary: updates an existing customer Ent resource

200.description: The request was successful; response contains the updated Cache node

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (Cache Node does not exist.)

MCCErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request

status.description: status of the HTTP error code

physicalPath.description: physical path location of the folder used for caching content

sizeInGb.description: physical size of the drive used for caching content

cacheNumber.description: corresponding nginx cache number. Valid cache numbers are 1 - 10

nginxMapping.description: full binding for corresponding nginx cache drive

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code

MccCacheNodeResourceList.description: Object that includes an array of MccCacheNodeResource and a possible link for next set

nextLink.description: The URL the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging)

MccCustomerResourceList.description: Object that includes an array of MccCustomerResource and a possible link for next set

nextLink.description: The URL the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging)

AdditionalCustomerProperties.description: Model representing customer for connected cache resource

peeringDbLastUpdateTime.description: last update timestamp of peering db update

signupStatus.description: status of signup represents as true or false

peeringDbLastUpdateDate.description: timestamp of last update to peering db

customerTransitAsn.description: transit asn of the customer who provides transit

customerAsnEstimatedEgressPeekGbps.description: the estimated customer asn peering Peek in Gigabits per second

productVersion.description: product version as part of additional cache node properties

isProvisioned.description: is provisioned flag as part of additional cache node properties

cacheNodeStateDetailedText.description: detailed text for cache node state as part of additional cache node properties

cacheNodeStateShortText.description: short text for cache node state as part of additional cache node properties

cacheNodeState.description: state of cache node state as part of additional cache node properties

driveConfiguration.description: drive configurations for the cache node

proxyUrl.description: proxy url property in the MCC Object

ResourceProviderOperationList.title: Result of the request to list REST API operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results
ResourceProviderOperationList.description: List containing this Resource Provider's available operations

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next page for list of Azure operations

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

CustomerEntity.description: Model representing Cache Node for ConnectedCache resource

fullyQualifiedResourceId.description: fully qualified resource id of the customer in azure resource manager

isEntitled.description: flag to indicate if the customer is entitled

createCorrelationId.description: correlation id of the create customer operation

updateCorrelationId.description: correlation id of the update customer operation

shouldDelete.description: indicates if the customer is marked for deletion

deleteRectifierCorrelationId.description: correlation id of the delete operation

deleteAsyncOperationId.description: async operation id of the delete operation

clientTenantId.description: client tenantId of the customer subscription

attemptedDeletes.description: number of delete attempts of the customer

deletedFlagSetDateTime.description: timestamp when delete flag was set for the customer

synchWithArmAttemptsCount.description: number of sync attempts with arm

lastSyncWithArmTimestamp.description: timestamp of last sync with arm

isEnterpriseManaged.description: flag indicating if customer enterprise managed

customerAsn.description: asn (autonomous system number) of the customer entered value

transitAsn.description: transit asn for customer who provides transit

resendSignupCode.description: should the signup code be resent

verifySignupCode.description: should the code for signup be verified

CacheNodeEntity.description: Model representing Cache Node for ConnectedCache resource

fullyQualifiedResourceId.description: fully qualified resource id of the customer in azure resource manager

ipAddress.description: IP address of the cache node

isEnabled.description: flag indicating if the cache node is enabled

maxAllowableProbability.description: maximum allowable probability of the cache node

isEnterpriseManaged.description: is the cache node managed by enterprise

deleteAsyncOperationId.description: async operation id of the delete operation

clientTenantId.description: client tenantId of the customer subscription

deletedFlagSetDateTime.description: timestamp when delete flag was set for the customer

releaseVersion.description: release version of the cache node

lastSyncWithArmTimestamp.description: timestamp of last sync with arm

synchWithArmAttemptsCount.description: number of attempts to synchronize the customer with ARM

containerConfigurations.description: configuration details of cache node container

cidrCsvLastUpdateTime.description: timestamp of last update to cidr csv

bgpCidrCsv.description: comma separated value of bgp cidrs

bgpCidrCsvLastUpdateTime.description: timestamp of last update to bgp cidr csv

bgpLastReportedTime.description: timestamp of last bgp report time

bgpNumberOfTimesUpdated.description: number of times bgp has been updated

bgpAddressSpace.description: total addressable space as defined by the BGP CIDR blocks

bgpFileBytesTruncated.description: number of bytes truncated from source BGP output file on the CacheNode

cidrSelectionType.description: current selection type for CIDR range precedence

isFrozen.description: indicates that a specific cache node has been frozen (not selectable, not editable in UI)

controllingCacheNodeId.description: indicates the cache node id of the controlling cache node

reviewState.description: current state of the review process

reviewStateText.description: current text associated with the review state

reviewFeedback.description: current review feedback for the user

addressSpace.description: total addressable space as defined by the CIDR blocks

isVerified.description: total addressable space as defined by the CIDR blocks

location.description: ARM resource location for the cache node

resourceType.description: ARM resource type for the cache node

isDeleted.description: indicates that we have successfully received deleted

createCorrelationId.description: correlation Id that should be used for create

updateCorrelationId.description: correlation Id that should be used for update

deleteRectifierCorrelationId.description: correlation Id that should be used for delete

ioTRectifierCorrelationId.description: correlation Id that should be used for iot rectification

workerConnections.description: number of worker connections that is needed for the deployment manifest for MCC Container

workerConnectionsLastUpdatedDateTime.description: indicates the most recent date time when the worker count on the physical MCC was successfully updated

containerResyncTrigger.description: increment to trigger immediate re-sync of CacheNode to container configurations
